fasten_off and weave in ends purse lay your purse flat on the fabric leaving 1 at top for the opening using a flower marking pen trace along the sides of the purse row 1 chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring to from the top to the widest point of the purse row 2 ch2 2 double_crochet ch2 join with a slip_stitch to the then continue the line straight down to the ring 5 times fold cut out your lining 5/8 from the sewing line you just drew leave 1 at both sides fasten_off and weave in ends opening of lining sew along line you marked felt all items in a zippered pillow case really fold the side seam of the lining onto the center important to use a zippered case to keep all of of the bag you will now see a point at the the little bits together roll in a towel to bottom corner of the bag measure 3 from squeeze out the excess water leave to dry point onto the lining draw a line stuff the bag with towels to maintain the perpendicular to the side seam of the bag sew shape along this line this will make a little flap in the lining that looks like a triangle repeat for when dry use matching thread to sew the flap the other side to the center
